JIPipe
------

This package contains JIPipe and dependencies.

Installation
------------

1. Copy the contents into Fiji.app/plugins. If you already have OMERO installed, skip copying omero_ij-5.5.14-all.jar
2. Start ImageJ and install the missing update sites via the updater: clij clij2 IJPB-plugins ImageScience IJ-OpenCV-plugins Multi-Template-Matching

If you do not install the update sites, JIPipe will ask you on the first start.

Credits
-------

This package contains following third party software:

* OMERO ImageJ plugin (https://www.openmicroscopy.org/omero/downloads/) licensed under GPL v2 (See https://github.com/ome/omero-insight/blob/master/LICENSE.txt)
* Javaluator (https://github.com/fathzer/javaluator) licensed under LGPL v3 (https://opensource.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html)
* JGraphT (https://jgrapht.org/) licensed under EPL v2 (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jgrapht/jgrapht/master/license-EPL.txt)
* OpenHTMLToPDF (https://github.com/danfickle/openhtmltopdf) licensed under LGPL (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/danfickle/openhtmltopdf/open-dev-v1/LICENSE)
* PDFBox (https://pdfbox.apache.org/) licensed under Apache License v2 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
* FontBox (https://pdfbox.apache.org/) licensed under Apache License v2 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
* Jackson (https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson) licensed under Apache License v2 (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
* Image5D (https://github.com/fiji/Image_5D) License: https://github.com/fiji/Image_5D/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
